Items.Name: Mothership Scanners
Items.Text: Success: When you draft a mothership part you may draft another enemy from that pack and skip the next pack

Items.Name: Mothership Shields
Items.Text:
Success: All other mothership parts have 2 less health

Failure: All other mothership parts have 2 more health

Items.Name: Alien Obduction
Items.Text:
Success: Gain 1 action next turn

Failure: Lose 1 action next turn

Items.Name: Shapeshifter
Items.Text:
Can only be damaged by being directly targeted

Failure: Roll the sabotage dice when you invent an invention, until you fail an invention

Items.Name: Terraforming Drone
Items.Text: Success: You may discard this to prevent one Victory Point loss effect

Items.Name: Alien Field Scientist
Items.Text: Success: Gain 1 [^Genetics]

Items.Name: Stasis Ship
Items.Text: While facing this you may not use your last unused invention

Items.Name: Alien Mining Drone
Items.Text: Success: Gain 1 [^Robotics]

Items.Name: Steal Technology
Items.Text: Failure: Lose one of your inventions

Items.Name: Alien Science Ship
Items.Text: Success: Treat this as an invention that gains 1 resource of your choice

Items.Name: Mental Probing
Items.Text: Failure: Roll the sabotage die when you use an invention, until you fail to use an invention

Items.Name: Crystal Mining
Items.Text: Success: Gain 1 [^Magic]

Items.Name: Scanner Drone
Items.Text: Success: Look at your next draft pack

Items.Name: Blaster Invader
Items.Text: Success: This counts as an invention that deals 1 damage to an enemy

Items.Name: Mothership Cannons
Items.Text:
Success: You lose one less Victory Point from mothership parts

Failure: You lose one more Victory Point from mothership parts

Items.Name: Mothership Communications
Items.Text: Success: This acts as an invention that can trade one of your threats with someone else's threat

Items.Name: Alien Brute
Items.Text: They take 1 less damage from all sources to a minimum of 1

Items.Name: Alien Saboteur
Items.Text:
Can only be damaged by being directly targeted

Failure: Roll the sabotage die when you use an invention, until you fail to use an invention

Items.Name: Alien Jammer
Items.Text: If this can be targeted it must be targeted by inventions

Items.Name: Plant Explosive Crystals
Items.Text: After each of your actions, add a counter to this, if this gets to 4 counters, it triggers it's defeat text and is discarded

Items.Name: Regenerative Invader
Items.Text: After each time this takes damage it heals 1

Items.Name: Swarm Unit
Items.Text: This can only take 1 damage at a time

Items.Name: Shrink Ray Invader
Items.Text:
Success: One of your other enemie's counts as having half max health rounded down

Failure: One of your workers can only gather resources and takes half the resources rounded down

Items.Name: Shielded Invader
Items.Text: This unit ignores the first packet of damage it takes

Items.Name: Purifier Unit
Items.Text: Failure: Lose all your resources

Items.Name: Stealth Ship
Items.Text: You may not directly target this unless you choose to lose 1 Victory Point

Items.Name: Mind Control Expert
Items.Text: Failure: Lose one scientist

Items.Name: Infiltrate Labs
Items.Text: Anyimte you invent an invention roll the sabotage dice while this threat is alive

Items.Name: Incubate New Soldiers
Items.Text:
Success: After drafting you may discard one threat

Failure: After drafting draw one more threat next round

Items.Name: Mothership Engines
Items.Text: This has 2 less health for each mothership part you have destroyed

Items.Name: Mothership Core
Items.Text: Success: Gain 1 Victory Point for each other mothership part you destroyed at end of game (not including this)

Items.Name: Alien Drop Pods
Items.Text: Counts as 3 threats for targeting

Items.Name: Brainwashed Commando
Items.Text: Success: If you defeat him with exact damage, gain another scientist

Items.Name: Infiltrate the Governments
Items.Text: Failure: For every 2 inventions you have lose 1 Victory Point

Items.Name: Establish Homeworld Portal
Items.Text: Failure: Reveal the top card of the threat deck and take that penalty

Items.Name: Hypnotize Population
Items.Text: Failure: For every 5 points you have lose 1 at end of game

Items.Name: Alien Plague
Items.Text: Failure: Lose 1 Victory Point for each Scientist on an invention at end of game

Items.Name: Alien Dragon
Items.Text: Success: Gain 1 Victory Point for every other threat you defeated at end of game

Items.Name: Dreadnought Ship
Items.Text: Success: Gain 1 victory Point for each Ship you defeated at end of game

Items.Name: Purifier Ship
Items.Text: Ignore's taking damage packets less than 3

Items.Name: Alien Tactician
Items.Text: Immidiately take a failure effect of another threat in front of you

Items.Name: Toxic Clouds
Items.Text: Success: Deal 2 damage to all other threats

Items.Name: Alien Orbital Laser
Items.Text: Success: Deal 3 damage to another enemy, doubled if it's large
